Topic: Draw a fish in their habitat with labels.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw and label at least one fish and its habitat.
The student can show and label the water in which the fish lives.
The student can label what the fish needs to survive, such as water and food.
The student can show and label other plants or animals that live in or near the fish's habitat and explain how they are part of the environment.
The student can represent how the fish and its habitat are part of a system, working together to meet the fish's needs.
